code: import React,{useState}from'react';import UrlForm from'./components/UrlForm';import ResultsDisplay from'./components/ResultsDisplay';import LoadingSpinner from'./components/LoadingSpinner';import{verifyUrl}from'./services/api';import'./styles/App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[results,setResults]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const handleUrlSubmit=async url=>{setLoading(true);setError(null);setResults(null);try{const data=await verifyUrl(url);setResults(data);}catch(err){setError(err.message||'An error occurred while verifying the URL');}finally{setLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"app-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"URL Trustworthiness Verifier"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Check any URL for safety threats, SSL certificates, and phishing attempts"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{className:"app-main",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UrlForm,{onSubmit:handleUrlSubmit}),loading&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoadingSpinner,{}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"error-message",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Error"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:error})]}),results&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ResultsDisplay,{results:results})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("footer",{className:"app-footer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Powered by Google Safe Browsing, VirusTotal, SSL Labs, and PhishTank"})})]});}export default App;
